CMenuNav.Title: 5: Academic Resources
CMenuNav.Description: Explore academic resources available to help you
CMenuNav.BodyCopy:
Hold on, I still need to take what?

Make sure you know what classes you need to take during your academic career. See the steps below to know how to choose your classes.

Registration

Visit the Student Records and Registration Office to determine when you can register as well as how to register.

  • registrar@byui.edu
  • (208) 496-1000
Planning Your Classes

The Academic Discovery Center has a self-guided Web site to help you plan your class schedule.

  • academicdiscoverycenter@byui.edu
  • reedde@byui.edu
  • Discovery Center: (208) 496-9800, Support Center: (208) 496-4270
Online Courses

With Online course options, taking classes at BYUI is more convenient than ever. Consider enrolling in a few online courses each semester.

  • onlinelearning@byui.edu
  • (208) 496-1800)
